reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work great - you might need to remove some of the plastic hangoffs
reviews.reviewText: Installed into a 2009 RAV4 and they fit great. I did have to remove several hangoffs from the adapter in order for the ring to fit properly - and once that was done - it was an easy install. I recommend this over trying to re-use any existing adapters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for 2023 Subaru Legacy Base Model
reviews.reviewText: I used these recently to upgrade the speakers in my wife's car. They were a perfect fit and made installation a cinch. I had considered modifying the factory speaker mounts to fit the new ones but turns out there is a market on eBay for the old "new" factory speakers and they will more than pay for these plus the aftermarket speakers I bought!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and exact fit for the Gen 3 Toyota Tacoma.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bracket good/Hardware junk
reviews.reviewText: Overall good fit for my 2016 corolla. One of the holes was a little off on both doors but nothing a drill couldn’t fix. As others have said the included hardware is junk. The machine screws are small in diameter and the nuts are thin and easily stripped. Ended up getting some 1/4 bolts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product fitment is perfect unlike many other brands when all of the mounting holes don’t line up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work fine
reviews.reviewText: Works like they should. The included hardware is a bit questionable though, specifically the nuts. I had a few of them that wouldn't thread onto the bolts properly. It's okay though as I had enough to install both speaker brackets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the cost, but some down sides
reviews.reviewText: Hello,I purchased these for my 2007 Toyota Corolla LE. The positives for these adapters:The nice thing about them is they are very similar in size and shape to the factory adapters. They also line up with the rivet holes that are left over once the rivets are drilled out. The mounting bracket has a hole on the side to slide the new wiring through instead of having to re-route the wires or pinch them when mounting.The negatives of this mounting bracket:The bracket is not designed to fit a 6.5 inch speaker without modification. This means that the inside tabs will need to be trimmed off in order to fit the speaker correctly. This can be a pain to do if you do not have the right tools or do not take this into account prior to installation. Another issue is that the provided equipment includes bolts with washers and nuts that do not appear to lock very tightly. That is to say that the bolt and nuts appear as though they might loosen over time. If you are expecting to use self tapping screws, you will have to provide them yourself.Overall I give this 3 stars as it worked but required modifications and has me a little nervous that I might have to go buy locking washers at some point if I start to hear some rattling. Hope this quick review helped.

I read on another site that this fits certain Subaru models, including my 2016 Outback (with Harmon Kardon audio). Fit my car perfectly, only works for the rear doors! Install was very easy, great product
